title: Patch 5.18 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hi everyone!

We're here to help with any patch day issues that you may encounter today! If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate!

Cheers,
Zaps

replies.body:
Hello,

Not sure if this is where I leave this bug. This occurred in solo Q. I was diana Skarner ulti'd me. Then Tahm on my team ate me, whilst running away skarner ulti'd tahm for a second time in about 3 seconds. I think the bug is that skarner ulti gets reset if tahm eats the target. I have not tested and only happened once. Thought I'd let you know.

ZombieTucan :)

please refer this link please riot....l cannot login  many others have the same problem... in the comment section


http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/4KcH7kEJ-unexpected-platform-error
My Dasrus forge chroma skins dont come up in the skins menu at all or my yi ones???
Hi, do you mean in Champion Select or when looking at your profile? I was able to see and pick Darius' Chromas in champion select when testing for this.
